Title: Requires stretch limousines to be retired from use after ten years from manufacture or the accumulation of three hundred fifty thousand miles
Summary: Requires stretch limousines to be retired from use after ten years from manufacture or the accumulation of three hundred fifty thousand miles, whichever comes first.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring stretch limousines to be retired from use after ten years from manufacture or the accumulation of three hundred fifty thousand miles
